text.section: The Secretary of Budget and Management, or the Secretary's designee, shall serve as a nonvoting ex officio Council member.
The Secretary of Disabilities, or the Secretary's designee, shall serve as a nonvoting ex officio Council member.

The Children's Cabinet shall designate up to three individuals to serve on the Council on a rotating basis to represent each of the following stakeholder groups:
family members or family advocates; and
youth or youth advocates.
